name: businessinsider
text:
RT @ainecain: A gunman shot and killed two women in the parking lot of a North Carolina Family Dollar store Friday afternoon. One of the victims was a mother protecting her two small children.
https://t.co/zaXRQqythR via @businessinsider

name: businessinsider
text:
RT @rrpre: Larry Heine was a truck driver in the '70s. He had a pension and the occasional vacation to Hawaii. 

Then, lawmakers made a "conscious decision" to upturn trucking. It slashed the cost of transportation — making retailers richer, and truck drivers poorer. https://t.co/VxRMsNtu39

name: businessinsider
text: This Silicon Valley pharmacy, which powers Hims and Nurx, raised $39 million in three separate rounds with the same bare-bones pitch deck https://t.co/gzzDocJiBD
